snippet: Stricter supervision and standards would help the Energy Department’s loan guarantee program avoid a Solyndra repeat, a government report said.
abstract: White House audit finds that the Department of Energy's loan guarantee program for alternative energy projects, which produced the ill-fated loan to the solar panel maker Solyndra, needs more rigorous financial oversight and stricter performance standards for recipients to reduce the chance of future defaults.
lead_paragraph: Stricter supervision and standards would help the Energy Department’s loan guarantee program avoid a Solyndra repeat, a government report said.

headline.seo: Energy Dept. Loan Program Needs Oversight, Audit Finds
headline.main: Energy Loan Oversight Is Needed, Audit Finds
headline.print_headline: Energy Loan Oversight Is Needed, Audit Finds
